roleset.name: (subscribing to the) basic, underlying

role.descr: agent, entity treating arg1 as fundamental
what arg1 underlies, is basic to

example.name: fundamental-j: args 0,1
example.text: I see the logic , but I still think a Con Law scholar such as Obama should be more fundamental in his beliefs about upholding the law .
example.arg: a Con Law scholar such as Obama
in his beliefs about upholding the law

example.name: fundamental-j: arg1
example.text: His beliefs about upholding the law were not fundamental enough.
example.arg: His beliefs about upholding the law

example.name: fundamental-j: args 1, 2
example.text: East Timor truth commission finds U.S. "political and military support were fundamental to the Indonesian invasion and occupation".
example.arg: to the Indonesian invasion and occupation".

roleset.note: FUNDAMENTAL-J NOTES: Added by Julia (from fundamental.01-j)
